item.title: Earned Media
item.dc:creator: mila
item.description:
You can’t buy it. Earned media refers to the publicity gained through media, blogger, investor and influencer relations. BeyondROI’s earned media gets other people talking about our clients company/brand – especially customers, influencers, and other media entities. The ideal result is seeing our clients mentioned in everyday conversations. BeyondROI’s earned media solutions encourage prospects to […]
